name: TC_07_01_03 | Verify Autocomplete Suggestions Displayed for Partial and Empty Search Input in Help Center
description: Verify that user can see autocomplete suggestions that correspond to the entered letters in the Help center search, as well as previous search history when the search field is empty.
descriptionHtml: Verify that user can see autocomplete suggestions that correspond to the entered letters in the Help center search, as well as previous search history when the search field is empty.

steps.name: Preconditions: Login as a registered user
Fill the keyword into the Help Center search input field.
Verify that  autocomplete suggestions that match the input are displayed in popup search window
Click on "Help center" link in breadcrumbs
Fill the keyword into the Help Center search input field.
Verify that "Recent Searches" are displayed in popup search window
